location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Plan 7. The Euphrates between Basra & Nasiriya, 24th June, 1915’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:201 x 488 mm, on sheet 245 x 533 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Ordnance Survey, 1921.Compiled from map produced by the Intelligence Branch G.S. I.E.F. “D” serial no. 34.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.General map of the Euphrates River between Basra and Nasiriya [Nasiriyah] showing various channels with marshes depicted in detail.Convoy route from Nasiriya to Allowi [Alawi] indicated by pecked line.
